item.description:
November's event will be a SATURDAY Meetup.

This month's topic: The Writing ABC: Workshopping

For the rest of the year, we will discuss the writing basics. This month we will talk about how we help each other make our work better.

Agenda:

4:00 Names. How do you give a good critique?
Topic: Revising

Novmber Challenge: Bring a rejection slip!
Writing Prompt: (TBD)

5:00 Break
Book / Magazine Offerings
Open Discussions

group.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Science Fiction Writers November Meetup
